# Search...


This data portal is designed to allow for fast but limited access to the static data sets stored on Whisperwind.

## Genomic Position
```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(shiny)
shinyApp(
  
  ui = fluidPage(
    textInput(inputId = "pos", label = "pos"),
    actionButton(inputId = "submit", label = "submit"),
    textOutput(outputId = "loci_result")
  ),
  
  server = function(input, output){
    
    p <- eventReactive(input$submit, {runif(input$pos)})
    
    output$loci_result <- renderText({p})
  }
)
```
